dublinCore.dc:title: HR 724 ENR: To amend the Clean Air Act to remove the requirement for dealer certification of new light-duty motor vehicles.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen
form.official-title: To amend the Clean Air Act to remove the requirement for dealer certification of new light-duty motor vehicles.

section.header: Removal of requirement for dealer certification of new light-duty motor vehicles
section.text: Section 207(h) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7541(h)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (2) and (3) as paragraphs (1) and (2), respectively.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
